statements: SELECT * FROM user_authentication;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, first_name, last_name FROM user_authentication WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_authentication WHERE first_name = 'John' OR last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_authentication WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM user_authentication WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE last_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_authentication WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT account_id, balance FROM investment_accounts WHERE balance > 10000;
SELECT * FROM investment_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN investment_accounts ON users.user_id = investment_accounts.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM investment_accounts WHERE balance > 1000.00;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM investment_accounts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000' ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, balance FROM users INNER JOIN investment_accounts ON users.user_id = investment_accounts.user_id WHERE balance < 1000.00 ORDER BY username ASC, balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM investment_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'j%';
SELECT * FROM login_history WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY login_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logins FROM login_history GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, user_id FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT u.username, i.balance FROM users u LEFT JOIN investment_accounts i ON u.user_id = i.user_id WHERE i.balance > 1000.00;
SELECT u.username, l.login_time FROM users u INNER JOIN login_history l ON u.user_id = l.user_id WHERE l.login_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT u.username, COUNT(l.log_id) AS login_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN login_history l ON u.user_id = l.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING login_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT password_hash FROM users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT user_id, email, balance FROM users JOIN investment_accounts ON users.user_id = investment_accounts.user_id;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'admin' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@domain.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT u.username, a.account_id, a.balance FROM users u JOIN investment_accounts a ON u.user_id = a.user_id;
SELECT u.username, u.email, l.attempt_time FROM users u JOIN login_attempts l ON u.user_id = l.user_id WHERE l.successful = false;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, password FROM users WHERE email = 'jane@example.com';
SELECT account_id, user_id, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, access_time, ip_address, device_info FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT u.username, a.account_type, SUM(a.balance) as total_balance FROM users u JOIN accounts a ON u.user_id = a.user_id GROUP BY u.username, a.account_type
SELECT u.username, la.attempt_time FROM users u JOIN login_attempts la ON u.user_id = la.user_id WHERE la.attempt_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY la.attempt_time DESC

SELECT u.username, s.login_time, s.logout_time, al.access_time FROM users u JOIN sessions s ON u.user_id = s.user_id JOIN access_logs al ON u.user_id = al.user_id WHERE s.login_time > '2022-01-01' AND al.access_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY s.login_time
